In the first part he talks about the decline of language learners and proves his point with statistics, he then goes on and talks about the problems, that come with this.
He thinks people shouldn't rely on their phone, because it can disappoint you.

He also talks about how not everyone is speaking englishEnglish and that if you don't speak other languages, it may exclude you from a job, because a foreign language speaker is really wanted nowadays.
